1. See if the property exists

glide.ui.polaris.theme.custom

2. If it does not, create it like this:

  1. Switch to Global
  2. Go to 'sys_properties.list'.
  3. Create a new record:
    • Name: glide.ui.polaris.theme.custom
    • Description: The default UX Theme [sys_ux_theme] used by the system. There can be only one.
    • Type: String
    • Value: 9446b3de4788ca10d54c2eee316d43a2
  4. Save.

3. Next, link the new Property to this category page like this:

  1. Go to Category Property [sys_properties_category_m2m]
  2. Create a new record
    • Category: GlideFast
    • Order: 1
    • Property: glide.ui.polaris.theme.custom
  3. Save

Finally, the property should now appear on this page for you to edit. This property determines which Theme is displayed to the users as the default.
